title: [突發]日本戰線手足將於聯合國人權理事會例會發言 內容為國安法及12港人被送中事件

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/StandwithHKJPN/posts/365263134879766

[BREAKING] [Press Release]

仲記唔記上年9月何韻詩曾經到過聯合國發言呢？
我地嘅成員William今日已經到埗瑞士日內瓦，並會喺瑞士時間9月21日下午或9月22日上午，喺聯合國人權理事會例會中就香港國安法實行同12港人被送中事件發言，各位記得mon實直播，支持William！
附圖係Stand with HK@JPN發出嘅正式新聞稿，歡迎各位傳媒朋友轉載報導。

Remember how Denise Ho stood up to China during her UN speech last Sep?
We’re incredibly excited and honoured to announce that our fellow teammate William has been invited to speak at the United Nations Human Rights Council at the same capacity. William arrived at Geneva safely this morning, and will be addressing the UNHRC conference either this afternoon (21 Sep) or tomorrow morning (22 Sep) CEST time (UTC +2). William’s speech will highlight the recent case of 12 young Hong Kong activists being arrested at sea and are currently still under detention in China, as well as the corresponding sweeping effect of the punitive National Security Law. Please make sure that you tune in to live broadcast of the conference in support of William!

See attached SWHK@JPN’s official press release on the above. Press & Media - please feel free to report and publish as you see fit, or contact us for further info.

UN Web TV
https://www.un.org/webcast/schedule/latest.html
